titleStmt.title: The Quakers advice to the Presbyterians, or, Their evil practises against the now established government being friendly admonitions to exhort them to loyalty and obedience / written by an eminent Quaker and sent in a letter to a gentleman of the black cloak by W.P.
titleStmt.author: W. P.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
